common_issues.title: Pieces OS and application performance issues
common_issues.description: Users report issues with Pieces OS not running after multiple attempts and reinstallation on Windows.  Additionally, the desktop application is slow, laggy, and unresponsive, especially after the latest update.  LLMs are also not providing complete or correct code. Troubleshooting steps include checking logs, reinstalling, and ensuring sufficient system resources.

Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Copilot struggles to access and utilize workstream activities
common_issues.description: Users report Copilot failing to locate or utilize workstream activity data, especially when requesting summaries or reports.  Issues include time range selection being ignored and inability to access past activities.  While single activity access via the 'start copilot chat' button may work, multi-activity access is problematic. This affects daily work reporting and updating past tasks. The issue appears across macOS and potentially other platforms.

related_issues.title: Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
related_issues.text:
Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Last week, I used the copilot for creating report of the day's work logs.
It worked properly but I doesn't work since yesterday(I don't know the issue starts from yesterday but I detected it on yesterday)

Copliot can't find the activities in workstream and It doesn't care about time range selection.

It works when using 'start copilot chat' button in specific activity, but can't use with multiple activities.

I hope to use it for creating daily work report everyday.

- requested today's daily work report
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fb4e4763-8866-432f-9ce5-12b4a0b4eead)
- requested today's daily work report using english
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e11a9ed2-2714-4f2b-8d6b-c3272dccafbd)
- showing that I have acitivities
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c27034e-0640-45b5-8da8-83e715b95e5e)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces app on Windows crashes/lags/fails to start
common_issues.description: Multiple users report Pieces for Windows crashing when moving between screens or scrolling, failing to launch after installation, or experiencing significant lag and slow response times, especially in Copilot chat. Issues reported across different Pieces OS versions (10.0.1, 12.0.0).  Further investigation needed to identify root cause and potential solutions.

related_issues.title: Crash when scrolling or moving a window to another screen
related_issues.text:
Crash when scrolling or moving a window to another screen
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS 12.0.0, Pieces for Developers 4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I don't know how to provide more info.
Every time I move the app on my left screen, it crashes. Oftentimes when I scroll the chats list or the chat itself, it crashes, too.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. common_issues.title: Pieces OS slow performance and unresponsiveness
common_issues.description: Users report slow performance and unresponsiveness in the Pieces desktop app and VS Code extension, especially after updates or sending multiple messages.  Symptoms include lag, delayed responses, and high CPU/RAM usage. Some users experience complete application failure. Troubleshooting steps like hard reset haven't resolved the issue.  The error message "404 Publisher Model not found" suggests potential server-side issues with the Gemini-pro model.

related_issues.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
related_issues.text:
UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, VS Code, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After sending several messages to Pieces Copilot in the extension for VS Code, there is a significant performance drop to the program which leads to the app eventually becoming extremely slow and difficult to use when pressing buttons, using keyboard input, and the speed of which a LLM responds. CPU usage and RAM usage also spikes when this occurs.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Ollama Installation Failures Across Platforms
common_issues.description: Users are reporting failures installing Ollama and launching Pieces OS on Linux, Windows, and macOS.  Linux users encounter immediate "Ollama failed to install" errors. Windows and macOS users report Pieces OS failing to start or respond, especially after updates.  Further investigation is needed to pinpoint the root causes and potential solutions across these operating systems.

related_issues.title: Ollama Fails to Install on Linux
related_issues.text:
Ollama Fails to Install on Linux

### Operating System / Platform

### Your Pieces OS Version

### Early Access Program

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

User reports immediate "Ollama failed to install" diaglog upon clicking install Ollama install button in Pieces desktop app
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. related_issues.title: Pieces OS not running or responding after latest tahoe beta update
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS not running or responding after latest tahoe beta update
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

latest

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

it just won't open or respond after the latest tahoe beta update
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving the 'Pieces OS and application performance issues' as it has the highest frequency and impacts Windows users significantly. Investigate logs, resource usage, and recent updates for potential fixes.

Address the 'Copilot struggles to access and utilize workstream activities' issue on macOS, focusing on time range selection and multi-activity access. This impacts daily reporting and task management.
Investigate the 'Pieces app on Windows crashes/lags/fails to start' issue across different Pieces OS versions. Gather crash reports and user feedback to identify the root cause.
Troubleshoot 'Pieces OS and Ollama Installation Failures Across Platforms', especially the immediate failure on Linux. Provide clear installation instructions and address platform-specific issues.
For the 'Pieces OS slow performance and unresponsiveness' issue, investigate high CPU/RAM usage and the '404 Publisher Model not found' error. Optimize performance and ensure server stability.
Address the LLM code generation issues reported in ticket #716 to ensure LLMs provide complete and correct code.
Improve communication with users on tickets like #759 ('Can't login') and #769 ('Authentication flow error') to provide timely updates and solutions.
